General.Name: meerecompany Incorporated
General.Description: meerecompany Incorporated manufactures and sells display and semiconductor equipment in South Korea. Its display equipment include edge grinders and profilers, drilling machines, and cover and mother glass grinders; OLED, edge, and AOI inspection equipment; and laser cutters, markers, and trimmers, as well as laser polarized film cutting machines. The company's semiconductor equipment comprise loaders and unloaders, FOUP packing machines, ultra sonic cleaners, wafer back and edge grinders, and laser cutters and markers. It also provides sensors and surgical robots. The company was formerly known as Meerae Engineering Inc and changed its name to meerecompany Incorporated in October 2004. meerecompany Incorporated was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
